clinical_study.brief_title: Reduced ER-QOL in Families After Congenital Cataract Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Study on Assessments of the Eye-related Quality of Life, Functional Vision, and Their Determinants Using the PedEyeQ in Children After Congenital Cataract Surgery and Their Families

brief_summary.textblock: Children after congenital cataract surgery experience a lower quality of life and reduced functional vision. Their families have also been seriously affected. Investigators should pay more attention to them, and measures should be administered to families.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of half a year

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- visually not significant cataract, and ophthalmic surgery (incisional or laser) within one month
Exclusion Criteria:
- parents who were inability to communicate were also excluded
